snippet: 3M, the maker of Post-it notes and Scotch Tape, has agreed to buy the office and consumer products business of the Avery Dennison Corporation for $550 million in cash.
abstract: 3M, the maker of Post-it notes and Scotch Tape, has agreed to buy the office and consumer products business of the Avery Dennison Corporation for $550 million in cash.

headline.main: 3M to Acquire a Unit of Avery Dennison
